definitions.definition: One who precedes ; one who has preceded another in any state, position, office, etc.; one whom another follows or comes after, in any office or position.
A model or type of machinery or device which precedes the current (or later) one. Usually used to describe an earlier, outdated model.
examples: The steam engine was the predecessor of diesel and electric locomotives.

definitions.definition: A vertex having a directed path to another vertex

main_definition: One who precedes ; one who has preceded another in any state, position, office, etc.; one whom another follows or comes after, in any office or position.
secondary_definitions: A model or type of machinery or device which precedes the current (or later) one. Usually used to describe an earlier, outdated model.
( mathematics ) A vertex having a directed path to another vertex
